numbered_ace_sentences: 1. A higher percentage of men send texts to communicate with their parents.
2. A higher percentage of women send texts to communicate with their parents.
3. I wonder how close the parents live to the young adults who visit their parents in person.
4. I am a senior in high school.
5. I have not attended college yet.
6. In college, I will not live with my parents.
8. The headline is: Say Hello: How Often Young Adults Communicate With Their Parents.
